TopicTitle: I just accidently quick loaded - any chance for reverting this?

Articles.Content:
Hi there,

I was firing my new rocket to the little moon.

Short story:

I accidently hit quickload (thought I had saved a few seconds before) and ended up with a savegame which is quite old :-/

Any chance for reverting this?
If you're quick enough you can close KSP with Alt+F4 and load the persistence, but if it autosaves....
I hate when that happened. Especially when I think the last quicksave is a very recent one ...
